intro: This chirpy meme coin brings Latinos to Web3 faster than abuela chasing after her missing chancla. Our blockchain feathered friend is not just about crypto; he is also about fashion, with every transaction strutting its stuff down the digital catwalk. Peri aims to be #1 in Latino meme coin culture and fashion. Peri will one day have fans all over the globe chanting
disclaimer: Disclaimer: $PERI is a memecoin and has no utility. Don't risk money you are afraid of losing. The price may go up or down. We are not responsible for the token's price.
guide_step1: Create a brand new wallet with Phantom App, keep your seed phrase safe, write it down and keep it safe!
guide_step2: Convert some money into Solana ($SOL) through phantom wallet.
guide_step3: Now visit pump.fun and connect your wallet.
guide_step4: Swap the Solana in your wallet for Peri, you can find Peri as an option by pasting in the contract address.
clickToRestart: Click anywhere or press Space to Restart
